name: baking
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the activity of making things such as cakes, bread, and biscuits by cooking them inside an oven: I use palm sugar in baking, and I really like the taste. The show led to a huge rise in the popularity of baking.
the process or fact of something being cooked inside an oven: The pastry may puff up during baking. After baking, the cheesecake is chilled and topped with cream. a baking dish
More examplesFewer examplesI would love to improve my baking as my bread tends to be flat and my pastry soggy.Animal fat is widely used in both cooking and baking.The rolls do swell a lot during baking, so allow space.After half an hour of baking, pull the paper off so the top can brown. This variety of potato is best for baking, chips, or mash.
